subject: Follow-Up on Order #SSN4426 – No Update Received
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,


I am following up again regarding my order #SSN4426, placed on December 5th
for $122.70. This is now my 3rd/4th email with no response or update.


I still have not received the item, any tracking information, or any
communication about the status of my order. Please provide an immediate
update on when it will ship or confirm if the order needs to be canceled
and refunded.


I would appreciate a prompt response as this has been an ongoing issue.


Thank you,

Adrina Alvarez
